name: GobRush
description:
GobRush is a small game that I made for Bored Pixel Jam 3.

Turns out, I didn't have time to finish it, so the game turned out to be a prototype.

Basically, the game is about doing the appropriate action (in the right direction) for dealing with its corresponding enemy type.

I'm uploading what I've done so far and I'll be uploading the the finished game maybe mid February. All the game art are basically done but the programming is still in progress.

Credits:
Made everything myself except for the pixel font. (Pixelbroidery by Tusoud)

Next update: (February 15)

  • More Enemies (3 more)
  • Add the remaining game mechanics (Pressing J brings out a spear, Pressing K brings out a shield, Both J and K brings out a bow)
  • Background
  • Sounds
  • Health
  • Better UI/UX

If you wish to see the finished product, please come by again on February 15. Or, follow me here in itch.io
